name: mock-services
description: Mock services for media streaming, broadcasting, and analytics

scripts.all: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --handle-input "pnpm run streaming" "pnpm run broadcast" "pnpm run analytics" "pnpm run cdn"
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --handle-input "pnpm run streaming" "pnpm run broadcast" "pnpm run analytics" "pnpm run cdn"
